titleStmt.title: Answeres to the particulars proponed by His Majesties commissionar

notesStmt.note: The commissioner was James Hamilton, third Marquis and first Duke of Hamilton--NUC pre-1956 imprints and DNB.
This item is found at reels 907:12 and 1700:7.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library and Harvard University. Library.
